name: Egmont Eco Leisure Park
description:
We're New Plymouth's highest-rated backpacker

Wake to birdsong in our modern backpacker's in central New Plymouth. 

We're situated in our own peaceful seven-acre valley with three acres of native trees and a bubbling stream. You can laze in a hammock under the trees and listen to the birdsong or dare to feed our own monster Egmont eels by hand... 

Great for groups, family reunions, sport teams or the single traveller to enjoy the company of our many other guests. Short or Long term stays all welcome.
 
All of this is only a 15-minute riverside stroll to the centre of New Plymouth.

Terms and Conditions 
ACCOUNTS:
A deposit of the full amount is required to confirm all reservations. No deposit no confirmed reservation. No reduction of amount to be paid for numbers of guests not staying as being confirmed 14 days prior to arrival or early departure or late arrival. Some weekends and Christmas/New Year period a minimum stay is required. Peak/unit rates apply 20 December - 31 January, most public holidays and some event weekends. Please check when booking. Management reserves the right to alter tariffs without notice. All tariffs are reviewed in September each year. 

CANCELLATIONS:
A cancellation fee of the amount of deposit applies to all bookings. Deposits for bookings cancelled less than 14 days prior to arrival will not be refunded unless the bed/room/chalet/site can be refilled, less a $25.00 or 20% cancellation fee which either is the larger amount. 
GROUPS : For groups over 10 guests bookings cancelled less than 21 days prior to arrival will not be refunded unless the bed/room/chalet/site can be refilled, less a $25.00 or 20% cancellation fee which either is the larger amount.
